quotes.quote: A barbarian punches someone when he feels like it, a soldier attacks when it's time to attack, and Ikta Solork says everything he wants whenever he wants to say it.
Chasing someone is tiring, and being chased is mentally exhausting. But making someone chase you can be fun.

People started growing crops because going hunting without knowing if you'd catch anything was a pain. People dug wells because going all the way to the river was a pain. Laziness is the mother of human progress.
I'll give you some wise words, Shining Sleepless General. All heroes die of overwork.
If you think unconditional kindness is good, and any sort of kindness that comes with conditions is hypocrisy, you should reconsider. People can only achieve as much as the situation allows.
